abstract: Atlanta, Ga, home to hit television series The Walking Dead, has embraced zombies with variety of parades and festivals, even labeling itself Zombie Capital of the World in Atlanta's monthly magazine.
snippet: The city, home to the hit series “The Walking Dead,” has embraced the monsters with a variety of parades and festivals celebrating the undead.
lead_paragraph: The city, home to the hit series “The Walking Dead,” has embraced the monsters with a variety of parades and festivals celebrating the undead.

headline.main: Zombie Apocalypse? Atlanta Says Bring It On
headline.print_headline: Zombie Apocalypse? Atlanta Says Bring It On
headline.seo: Zombie Apocalypse? Atlanta Says Bring It On
